eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.restapi

Class ElasticSearchRequest<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.restapi.ElasticSearchRequest<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type variable representing the keys of the stored objects (i.e., primary keys).
    V - Type variable representing the values of the stored objects (i.e., their values on a given attribute). // FIXME: A default limit of 10000 results per query is typically specified in ElastiSearch.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimSearch<K,V>, Runnable

    public class ElasticSearchRequest<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>
extends Object
implements ISimSearch<K,V>, Runnable
    Implements functionality for various similarity search queries (numerical, categorical, spatial) against an Elasticsearch REST API.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ElasticSearchRequest

        public ElasticSearchRequest(HttpConnector httpConn,
                            int operation,
                            String keyColumnName,
                            String valColumnName,
                            String searchValue,
                            int collectionSize,
                            ISimilarity simMeasure,
                            ConcurrentLinkedQueue<PartialResult> resultsQueue,
                            Map<String,HashMap<K,V>> datasets,
                            String hashKey,
                            Logger log)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        httpConn - The HTTP connection that provides access to the data.
        operation - The type of the similarity search query (0: CATEGORICAL_TOPK, 1: SPATIAL_KNN, 2: NUMERICAL_TOPK).
        keyColumnName - Name of the attribute holding the entity identifiers (keys).
        valColumnName - Name of the attribute containing numerical values of these entities.
        searchValue - String specifying the query value according to the type os the search operation (i.e., keywords, a location, or a number).
        collectionSize - The count of results to fetch.
        simMeasure - The similarity measure to be used in the search.
        resultsQueue - Queue to collect query results.
        datasets - Dictionary of the attribute data available for search.
        hashKey - The unique hash key assigned to this search query.
        log - Handle to the log file for keeping messages and statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        public int compute(int k,
                   ConcurrentLinkedQueue<PartialResult> partialResults)
        Connects to a REST API and retrieves items qualifying to the submitted similarity search request.
        Parameters:
        k - The count of results to fetch.
        partialResults - The queue that collects results obtained from the specified query.
        Returns:
        The number of collected results.

      • run

        public void run()
        Sends the specified similarity search request against the REST API.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • getNextResult

        public List<V> getNextResult()
        Progressively provides the next query result. NOT applicable with this type of search, as results are issued directly to the queue.
        Specified by:
        getNextResult in interface ISimSearch<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>
        Returns:
        The next available result.
